description:
odbc: pin down memory used by parameters properly

Fixes issue 5.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/odbc

On 2013/04/29 07:26:27, brainman wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/odbc

I had the same problem and chose the same solution in my initial ODBC implementation.  See: https://github.com/LukeMauldin/lodbc/blob/master/statement.go

Your change looks good to me.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/odbc/source/detail?r=62682477fd4e ***

odbc: pin down memory used by parameters properly

Fixes issue 5.
